entry.title:

Seventeen members of
entry.content:
https://twitter.com/disclosetv/status/1549460928328077314
Seventeen members of congress were arrested today for protesting the recent SCOTUS decision re: Roe.
There's a video in that thread of AOC seemingly pretending to be handcuffed, but she raises a triumphant fist at one point, so maybe she didn't realize what it looked like she was doing.
I don't really know how to come at this from a TheMotte perspective. I just find it so humiliating that this is our government. From top to bottom, the US Government is a total embarrassment.
